name: XCTKVOExpectation
desc: An expectation that is fulfilled when a Key Value Observing (KVO) condition is met.

items.name: init(keyPath: String, object: Any)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that is fulfilled by any KVO change to the specified key path of the observed object.

items.name: init(keyPath: String, object: Any, expectedValue: Any?)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that is fulfilled when a KVO change causes the specified key path of the observed object to have an expected value.

items.name: init(keyPath: String, object: Any, expectedValue: Any?, options: NSKeyValueObservingOptions)
items.desc: Creates an expectation that is fulfilled when a KVO change causes the specified key path of the observed object to have an expected value. Allows custom observation options to be provided by the caller.

items.name: var keyPath: String
items.desc: The key path that is being observed for KVO changes.

items.name: var observedObject: Any
items.desc: The object that is being observed for KVO changes.

items.name: var expectedValue: Any?
items.desc: The value that the expectation is waiting for the observed key path to take.

items.name: var options: NSKeyValueObservingOptions
items.desc: The NSKeyValueObservingOptions used when registering for observation.

items.name: var handler: XCTKVOExpectation.Handler?
items.desc: An optional handler that performs custom evaluation of changes to the observed key path.

items.name: typealias XCTKVOExpectation.Handler
items.desc: A custom handler to be called when a KVO change is observed for a specified key path.
